definitions.definition: Of, relating to, or being the person or entity after which something or someone is named; serving as an eponym.

parsedExamples.example: Robinson Crusoe is the eponymous hero of the book.
Prince Hamlet is the eponymous protagonist of the Shakespearian tragedy Hamlet.
The language Limburgish is named after the eponymous provinces in Belgium and the Netherlands.
